thread.title: Ducks put defenseman Josh Manson on injured reserve
thread.title_full: Ducks put defenseman Josh Manson on injured reserve

author: wtopstaff
title: Ducks put defenseman Josh Manson on injured reserve
text:
Home » News » Sports » NHL » Ducks put defenseman Josh… Ducks put defenseman Josh Manson on injured reserve By The Associated Press October 24, 2015 6:04 pm 
ST. PAUL, Minn. (AP) — The Anaheim Ducks placed defenseman Josh Manson on injured reserve because of an unspecified upper-body injury and recalled defenseman Joe Piskula from San Diego of the American Hockey League before their game Saturday night against the Minnesota Wild. 
Manson was hurt Thursday night in a loss at Nashville. He joins defenseman Simon Despres on the injured list. 
Piskula has played in 13 games with Los Angeles, Calgary and Nashville. Topics:
